text: Andrés Gimeno Tolaguera (3 August 1937 – 9 October 2019) was a Spanish tennis player. In 1972, when he won the French Open and he was the oldest first-time grand slam champion of the open era at 34 years of age. Gimeno died of cancer, on 9 October 2019, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Male tennis players Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona
title: Andrés Gimeno
